title: blackh4t
author: blackh4t

content: What happened:: They must launch 1 years ago , not launched and now ico portal is hide for all , they blocked every one if talk about why no launch and why no data of launch Reference Link: Amount Scammed: 500 from me , maybe 2 M from worldwidePayment Method: BTC USDTProof of Payment: i cant share PM/Chat Logs: They banned me from telegram groupsAdditional Notes: For test go to they telegram group and talk about badness launch and talk about launch data , they will block u ... capcut video editor

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: This forum does not judge scammers. The only action that can be taken here is that if the scammer has a Bitcointalk account and there is clear evidence that he is really scamming then DT members can red tag that account as a scammer. But you only provided a twitter profile link of the person you complained against. There will be no effect here- You have left no clear evidence here- The person you are complaining about does not have a forum profile- You don't post any TxID that can be considered a clear proof- There is no evidence of the accused's wallet here- There is no story mentioned here, how you fell victim to the scam.So I think your report is completely baseless

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: This project had a previous announcement thread[1] by member @emmaglory5[2] here which was later deleted.Then launched 2 rounds of the bounty program[3][4] managed by the worst management team of all time (sofico), if you look at the ERC20 addresses of some of the first round participants, they haven't even received bounty distribution.Quote from: Z_MBFM on June 09, 2023, 11:10:46 AMThe only action that can be taken here is that if the scammer has a Bitcointalk accountNothing wrong, I remember several projects creating an account after being reported as scams here just to respond to all the accusations.1. https://ninjastic.space/topic/54061382. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=26509423. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5366713.04. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5376531.0

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: blackh4t on June 09, 2023, 08:53:06 AMWhat happened:: They must launch 1 years ago , not launched and now ico portal is hide for all , they blocked every one if talk about why no launch and why no data of launch Quote from: Z_MBFM on June 09, 2023, 11:10:46 AM- You have left no clear evidence hereThere is enough to confirm the suspicions, it is true that they show pictures of the team, but guess what, all the pictures are in black and white, and when you search for them on the Internet, you find no trace of these people except links related to this project, and there is no additional information, personal life or anything else.PARTNERS page does not contain any clickable links.The date the site was registered in 2019-07-04 However, there are no results in the Google search. Their plans are limited to the year 2023, although they existed before it.There is nothing trustworthy about this service.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: So, their ann here was talking about a 10k NFT collection Meta BattlebotsThe link and website are now dead: https://metabattlebots.com/Two of their team members were twitting last year about another 10k NFT collection:The website is now dead http://lasthopium.io/They were paying last year for articles and press releases like this:QuoteTo ensure outstanding performance and functionality of the Metaverse, Solidus is building a multiplayer 25km2 cutting-edge 3D/VR Metaverse Play2Earn/Play2Burn shooting/FPS war game in Unreal Engine 5. Players in the platform Metaverse will be able earn AITECH tokens by simply partaking in the game. These AITECH tokens can then be used in the platform market place to buy more weapons & skins that will upgrade their Battlebot.Now they claim;QuoteAT SOLIDUS AI TECH, WE HAVE COMPLETED THE MAIN BUILD OF OUR DATA CENTRE AND ARE READY TO COMMENCE THE INSTALLATION OF OUR HPC INFRASTRUCTURE WHICH IS BASED IN EUROPE (BUCHAREST), WHICH WILL SIGNIFICANTLY HELP TO BRIDGE THIS GAP AND WILL ENABLE EUROPEAN COMPANIES TO OBTAIN THEIR SUPERCOMPUTING POWER WITHIN THE EU.So, bullshit and vaporware.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: blackh4t on June 12, 2023, 06:05:36 AMin 2021 they started for first AI project , i bought 2021 must launched 2022 , and they delated launch data and sold to every one , soon soon soon First, i would like to know why did you invest in such a project without getting enough information about it. You should know that the easiest way to scam these days is to get the money in the form of crowdfunding and then run away with the collected money in the ICO and never look back to the project.Quote from: Z_MBFM on June 09, 2023, 11:10:46 AMThis forum does not judge scammers. The only action that can be taken here is that if the scammer has a Bitcointalk account and there is clear evidence that he is really scamming then DT members can red tag that account as a scammer. But you only provided a twitter profile link of the person you complained against. There will be no effect hereWell, i think that another reason to post this scam accusation is that the other people who wants or thinking to invest in this project can read this and are saved from this scam. Although nothing much would change, the scammers won't quit or become honest, the only thing is to give awareness of the people and remind them to be vigilant with these types of scams.
